document.full_text: britain's rory mcilroy, widely tipped as a future world number one, produced golf as dazzling as the spring sunshine at augusta national to charge into a share of the lead at the masters on thursday.
document.title: mcilroy and quiros take control at augusta
lines_and_colors: britain's rory mcilroy, widely tipped as a future world number one, produced golf as dazzling as the spring sunshine at augusta national to charge into a share of the lead at the masters on thursday.
